text: Donna Mercy Nalini Edirisinghe (18 December 1945 â€“ 17 March 2014), better known as Mercy Edirisinghe, was a popular Sri Lankan stage actress and singer. Her most famous play was a musical by Lushan Bulathsinhala, called Tharavo Igilethi (Ducks fly). He career has lasted for nearly 60 years. She was born in Ambepussa, Sri Lanka. Edirisinghe died in Gampaha, Sri Lanka. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Singers Category:Sri Lankan stage actors Category:Sri Lankan comedians
title: Mercy Edirisinghe
